title: Reconciliation Queue & Dashboard Overview
content:
Panda Reconciliation Queue

The reconciliation queue will be the main queue that the team will work out of when investigating and manually reconciling customer cash bank transactions. 

This panda page displays the most recent 10 unreconciled bank transactions from the last 3 days. From this page you can claim bank transactions, navigate to the bank transaction page, check the details of the bank transactions, change the agent, create a label, and add a Jira ticket if applicable.

To open up the reconciliation queue in Panda navigate to Payment Ops > Reconciliations > Reconciliations Queue. Along with the recon queue, have the Monthly Audit dashboard.

Features of the Recon Queue

  • Claim bank transactions

  • Navigate to the bank transaction via the bank transaction ID

  • View Amount, Date, Payment Method, Origination Account, Agent, Labels, Jira Ticket, and Description

  • Add an agent

  • Add new and additional labels

  • Add Jira ticket

  • Increase amount of displayed bank transactions from 10 to 25 or 50

  • Click on all displayed bank transactions individually or all at once

  • Batch any of the actions mentioned above

  • Filter Search by dates, payment method, amount, origination account, Jira ticket, agent, and label

  • Show unreconciled bank transactions older than the last 3 days

  • Display possible reconciliation matches

  • Reconcile transactions

Reconciliation Expectations

  1. Tag all new unreconciled bank transactions that surface each day

  2. Manually match and reconcile all bank transactions that you can after investigating

  3. For any bank transactions that can't be reconciled, manually track the details the Unreconciled Bank Transactions google sheet

    1. a slack reminder post each day in #payment-ops-recon

  4. If you reconciled and/or labeled all of the bank transactions in the queue and are waiting on external dependencies then

    1. look back and follow up on older unreconciled bank transactions in the quarter

    2. offer support to your team members working on payments Jira tickets 

  5. Comment on all manually reconciled bank transactions on why it was manually reconciled

Helpful Tips When Reconciling

  1. Has this issue been escalated before?

    1. Ask the team in the #payment-ops-recon Slack channel, if they have seen this issue before

      1. If someone has seen this issue before and there’s an outstanding Jira ticket that is waiting for Engineering to work on, then add the issue to the existing ticket

      2. If there is no outstanding ticket with the similar issue, then create a Jira ticket with the right team to fix root cause

  2. What is your problem statement?

    1. What happened? What is wrong? What is the problem statement?

    2. Potential Problems that it can be:

      1. Was the payment record not created?

      2. Was this an erroneous payment?

      3. Is this a double payment?

      4. Was this a manual payment?

  3. What is the impact/why is this important

    1. This will help with prioritization

  4. Provide evidence (data or panda links)

  5. Recognize patterns (data driven)

    1. Is it systemic or local?

    2. Ask ‘why’ 5x

    3. Are we able to identify the root cause?

    4. Is it dependent on EDP to identify?

  6. Identify the root cause

  7. Identify the action items needed

  8. Dependency

    1. Do we need help from our partners to resolve? Payments Engineering, Payroll Engineering, Risk, Accounting, TaxOps, etc?
